trait.name: Climber
entries: The ape has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb difficult surfaces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Bodily Rejuvenation
entries: If the axolotl loses any body parts (including organs), those missing body parts regrow and are restored after 40 days.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The axolotl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The axolotl can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the fresh water at least once an hour for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Climber
entries: The baboon has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb difficult surfaces.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the baboon can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The boar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The camel is naturally adapted to hot climates.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the cat has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Cat's Grace
entries: When the cat falls, if it falls 20 feet or less and is not {@condition incapacitated}, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet.

trait.name: Keen Sight & Smell
entries: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The cat's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Dextrous Climber
entries: The chameleon uses Dexterity (Acrobatics), rather than Strength (Athletics), to climb difficult surfaces.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The chameleon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}If the target is Tiny, it must succeed on a {@dc 8} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 8}).

action.name: Camouflage
entries: The chameleon camouflages itself with its surroundings, becoming {@condition invisible}. The invisibility ends for the chameleon after it leaves its space or attacks.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The chicken has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: If the chicken ends its turn flying, it stops flying and it falls. When the chicken falls in this way, its flying speed is 0 until it lands, its rate of descent is 60 feet per round, and when it lands, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the snake has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Dextrous Climber
entries: The snake uses Dexterity (Acrobatics), rather than Strength (Athletics), to climb difficult surfaces.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The crab can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in water at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the crocodile has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The crocodile has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The crocodile has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Death Roll
entries: The crocodile rolls in place, dealing 13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) piercing damage to any creature it's grappling. The crocodile can't take this action if its speed is 0.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The deer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The dog has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dog's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The dolphin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The dolphin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the dolphin sleeps, it is aware of its surroundings and can move at half speed.

trait.name: Water-Based Echolocation
entries: The dolphin can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened} or outside of water.
Additionally, the dolphin can't use its blindsight to see into a space not submersed in water.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the dolphin moved at least 30 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the eel has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Shock {@recharge}
entries: The eel electrocutes a creature within 5 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage and becomes {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The elephant is naturally adapted to hot climates.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The elephant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the elephant moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the elephant can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Weak Knees
entries: The elephant can't jump.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The elk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 3d4}) poison damage.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The crab can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in water at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the crocodile has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The crocodile has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The crocodile has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Tail. It can replace one attack with a use of Death Roll.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not {@condition grappled} by the crocodile. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Death Roll
entries: The crocodile rolls in place, dealing 27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) piercing damage to any creature it's grappling. The crocodile can't take this action if its speed is 0.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the eel has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Hazardous Body
entries: A creature that touches the eel or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eel makes two attacks: one with its Constrict and one with its Bite. It then uses Shock, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the eel can't constrict another target.

action.name: Shock {@recharge}
entries: The eel electrocutes a creature within 10 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) lightning damage and becomes {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its Beak and one with its Talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The elk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The frog can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the fresh water at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The frog's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The gecko has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The gecko can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The goat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The hyena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage or 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage if the target is a creature and it has already taken damage since the end of its previous turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The octopus can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The octopus can breathe only water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target the octopus is grappling. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Camouflage
entries: The octopus camouflages itself with its surroundings, becoming {@condition invisible}. The invisibility ends for the octopus after it leaves its space or attacks.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Sneaky
entries: The octopus takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Non-Olfactory
entries: The owl automatically fails on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Silent Flight
entries: While it's flying, the owl makes no sound unless it chooses to and it automatically succeeds on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the snake has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Dextrous Climber
entries: The snake uses Dexterity (Acrobatics), rather than Strength (Athletics), to climb difficult surfaces.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Hazardous Body
entries: A creature that touches the porcupine or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The porcupine has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Quill Launch
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 10/20 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Climber
entries: The scorpion has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb difficult surfaces.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The scorpion is naturally adapted to hot climates.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its Claws and one with its Sting.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The turtle is naturally adapted to hot climates.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The turtle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The turtle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the turtle. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the turtle, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the turtle's turns. If the turtle takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the turtle must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the turtle.
If the turtle dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Swim Breathing
entries: The shark can't breathe if its swimming speed is 0.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

entries: The sloth is naturally adapted to cold climates.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The sloth can hold its breath for 40 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The sloth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sloth makes three attacks: two with its Claws and one with its Bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The toad can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the fresh water at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toads's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The tortoise is naturally adapted to hot climates.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tortoise has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the tortoise is knocked {@condition prone}, roll a die. On an odd result, the tortoise lands upside-down and is {@condition incapacitated}. At the end of each of its turns, the tortoise can make a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, righting itself and ending the {@condition incapacitated} condition if it succeeds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tortoise makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Slam.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Shell Defence
entries: The tortoise withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortoise is {@condition prone}, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The wasp has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the weasel has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the giraffe moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The giraffe is naturally adapted to hot climates.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The giraffe has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The goat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The hippopotamus is naturally adapted to hot climates.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The hippopotamus has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the hippopotamus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Slam attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the hippopotamus can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Weak Knees
entries: The hippopotamus can't jump.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Swim Breathing
entries: The shark can't breathe if its swimming speed is 0.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The hyena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage if the target is a creature and it has already taken damage since the end of its previous turn.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The whale is naturally adapted to cold climates.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the whale sleeps, it is aware of its surroundings and can move at half speed.

trait.name: Water-Based Echolocation
entries: The whale can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened} or outside of water.
Additionally, the whale can't use its blindsight to see into a space not submersed in water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the lion has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Cat's Grace
entries: When the lion falls, if it falls 20 feet or less and is not {@condition incapacitated}, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the lion can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The mammoth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Weak Ankles
entries: The mammoth can't jump

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The octopus can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The octopus can breathe only water.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target the octopus is grappling. {@h}1 piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Small or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10}). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Camouflage
entries: The octopus camouflages itself with its surroundings, becoming {@condition invisible}. The invisibility ends for the octopus after it leaves its space or attacks.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Sneaky
entries: The octopus takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Non-Olfactory
entries: The owl automatically fails on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Silent Flight
entries: While it's flying, the owl makes no sound unless it chooses to and it automatically succeeds on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The ox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the panther has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Cat's Grace
entries: When the panther falls, if it falls 20 feet or less and is not {@condition incapacitated}, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet.

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the panther moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The parrot can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom (Insight) check.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage

trait.name: Hold Breath

trait.name: Environmental Adaptation
entries: The bear is naturally adapted to cold climates.

trait.name: Keen Smell

trait.name: Hazardous Body

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the weasel has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The otter can hold its breath for 5 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.
